TypeSignature.Value: public class ImageButton : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image, System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageButton extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler, class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
Public Class ImageButton Inherits Image Implements IButtonControl, IPostBackDataHandler, IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class ImageButton : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Image, System::Web::UI::IPostBackDataHandler, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IButtonControl

summary.span: 一个控件，用于显示图像并响应对图像进行的鼠标单击。

span.span: A control that displays an image and responds to mouse clicks on the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [确定用户单击的位置Determining Where the User Clicked](#DeterminingWhereTheUserClicked) - [ImageButton 控件和验证ImageButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件来显示响应鼠标单击的图像。Use the control to display an image that responds to mouse clicks. 同时和引发事件时控件被单击。Both the and events are raised when the control is clicked. 你可以使用事件处理程序，以使控件的行为类似于命令按钮。You can use the event handler to make the control behave like a Command button. 命令名称可通过使用与控件关联属性。A command name can be associated with the control by using the property. 这允许拥有多个控件放置在相同的网页上。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the same Web page. 值在中，属性可以然后以编程方式标识事件处理程序来确定适当的措施来执行时每个控件被单击。The value of the property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 属性还可以用于传递有关命令，例如，指定按升序进行排序的其他信息。The property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order. 使用控件是类似于使用 ASP.NET控件。Using the control is similar to using the ASP.NET control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[按钮 Web 服务器控件内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf)。For more information, see [Button Web Server Controls Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf). 和类概述控件。and the class overview for the control. ## 确定用户单击的位置Determining Where the User Clicked 通过使用事件处理程序，可以以编程方式确定单击的图像的坐标。By using the event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked. 然后可以编写代码的响应，根据坐标的值。You can then code a response, based on the values of the coordinates. 请注意原点 （0，0） 位于图像的左上角。Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image. ## ImageButton 控件和验证ImageButton Controls and Validation 默认情况下，执行页验证时控件被单击。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 若要防止发生页验证，将设置属性`false`。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192874)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192874). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建显示映像被单击位置的坐标的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that displays the coordinates at which an image is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ImageButton.Click Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.Click Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ImageButton.Click Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.Click Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便有精简的边框始终显示文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text always appears with a thin border. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例的第一部分必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。The first part of this code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 第二个部分必须保存为 (C# 中为.cs)，或者适用于 Visual Basic 的.vb 代码文件。The second part must be saved as a code file (either .cs for C# or .vb for Visual Basic). Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomImageButtonAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_imagebutton_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomImageButtonAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_imagebutton_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomImageButtonAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_imagebutton_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomImageButtonAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_imagebutton_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，执行页验证时控件被单击。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常设置为`false`重置或清除按钮以防止在单击该按钮时执行验证。This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 时的值属性设置为`true`，你还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件进行验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以防止在发生的页验证。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意如何方法单独激活每个验证控件。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButtonCausesValidation/CS/imagebuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButtonCausesValidation/VB/imagebuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 此事件导致页后，可以发布回服务器。This event causes the page to be posted back to the server. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件以显示从该处用户单击该图像的坐标。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the coordinates at which the user clicks the image. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ImageButton.Click Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.Click Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ImageButton.Click Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.Click Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在单击 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when an control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. > [!NOTE] > 此事件导致页后，可以回发到服务器。This event causes the page to post back to the server. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件来确定哪些控件被单击。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，多个控件相关和共享相同的值属性，如`Sort`。Sometimes, multiple controls are related and share the same value for the property, such as `Sort`. 使用此属性来补充命令执行，如关于的其他信息的属性`Ascending`。Use this property to supplement the property with additional information about the command to perform, such as `Ascending`. 值和属性通常用在事件处理程序来确定要执行时的操作控件被单击。The values of the and properties are typically used in the event handler to determine the action to perform when the control is clicked. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用相关联的命令参数与属性控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to associate a command argument with an control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 与 控件关联的命令名。

span.span: The command name associated with the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来指定时要执行的命令单击控件，如`Sort`， `Cancel`，或`Edit`。Use this property to specify the command to perform when the control is clicked, such as `Sort`, `Cancel`, or `Edit`. 这允许拥有多个控件放置在相同的网页上。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the same Web page. 在中，此属性中的值可以然后以编程方式标识事件处理程序来确定适当的措施来执行时每个控件被单击。The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 可以通过使用包含有关该命令，例如，指定按升序排序，补充信息属性。Supplemental information about the command, such as specifying ascending sort order, can be included by using the property. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用相关联的命令名称与属性控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to associate a command name with an control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以单击 以执行到服务器的回发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the can be clicked to perform a post back to the server.

value.span: 如果已启用该控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否可通过单击执行回发到服务器。Use the property to specify whether an can be clicked to perform a post back to the server. 如果将此属性设置为`false`，该控件会呈现在页上，但不会引发回发事件单击时。If you set this property to `false`, the control renders on the page, but does not raise a post back event when clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 页包含两个控件。The page contains two controls. 属性设置为`true`为`EnabledImageButton`图像按钮，从而导致回发到服务器在单击时。The property is set to `true` for the `EnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to post back to the server when clicked. 属性设置为`false`为`NotEnabledImageButton`图像按钮，从而可以呈现在页上，但不是回发到服务器在单击时。The property is set to `false` for the `NotEnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to render on the page, but not post back to the server when clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.Enabled#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.Enabled/CS/imagebutton.enabledcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.Enabled#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.Enabled/VB/imagebutton.enabledvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否为空字符串值生成替换文字特性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control generates an alternate-text attribute for an empty string value.

value.span: 为 时，指示 控件在 属性为空时不生成替换文字特性。

span.span: , indicating that the control does not generate an alternate-text attribute when the property is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件呈现属性使用`alt`属性。By default, the control renders the property using an `alt` attribute. 当未设置属性，控件不包括`alt`特性以指定在控件呈现的替换文字。When the property is not set, the control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate-text in the control rendering. XHTML 文档类型定义需要`alt`图像控件上的属性。The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls. 但是，辅助功能最佳做法建议不传达网页上的上下文相关的信息的图像控件不应指定`alt`属性。However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute. 您可以通过设置满足 XHTML 和可访问性要求属性`true`。You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the property to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property.

summary.span: 创建表示 控件的回发行为的 对象。

span.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

returns.span: 一个表示 控件的回发行为的 。

span.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象，表示控件的回发行为。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 对象通常然后传递给方法，用于获取对客户端脚本函数的引用，调用时，会导致服务器到页回发。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to postback to the page. 此方法主要由控件开发人员扩展时使用类。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 您可以重写在派生类来修改按钮控件的回发选项，或单击该按钮时调用客户端脚本中的方法。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 一定要调用基类的方法，以便这些标准的回发选项进行设置。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

summary.span: 处理 控件的已发布数据。

span.span: Processes posted data for the control.
Returns for all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用的成员控件。The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 检查以确定如果 x 和 y 值已发布，指示用户已单击该图像。The checks to see if the x and y values were posted, which indicates that the image was clicked by the user. 然后注册它想要在事件处理阶段过程中引发事件的页面。The then registers with the page that it wants to raise an event during the event-processing phase.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件并允许直接处理 事件。

span.span: Raises the event and allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 通过使用事件处理程序，可以以编程方式确定单击的图像的坐标。By using the event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked. 然后可以编写代码的响应，根据这些坐标的值。You can then code a response, based on the values of these coordinates. 请注意原点 （0，0） 位于图像的左上角。Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件以显示当用户单击该图像的坐标。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the coordinates where the user clicks the image. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ImageButton.Click Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.Click Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ImageButton.Click Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.Click Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置在引发 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

span.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when an control's event is raised.

value.span: 在引发 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

span.span: The client-side script that executes when an control's event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端脚本控件的引发事件。Use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when an control's event is raised. 为此属性呈现在指定的脚本控件的`OnClick`属性除了控件的预定义的客户端脚本。The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnCommand (System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e);

Protected Overridable Sub OnCommand (e As CommandEventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnCommand(System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件并允许直接处理 事件。

span.span: Raises the event and allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 使用事件处理程序以使控件的行为类似于命令按钮。The event handler is used to make the control behave like a Command button. 命令名称可通过使用与控件关联属性。A command name can be associated with the control by using the property. 这允许拥有多个控件在网页上放置。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the Web page. 在中，此属性中的值可以然后以编程方式标识事件处理程序来确定适当的措施来执行时每个控件被单击。The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 属性还可以用于传递有关命令，例如，指定按升序进行排序的其他信息。The property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order. > [!NOTE] > 通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件来确定哪些控件被单击。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.CommandArgument Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

summary.span: 确定图像在客户端上呈现之前是否已被单击。

span.span: Determines whether the image has been clicked prior to rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便它始终在自定义显示精简边框服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always displays a thin border in a custom server control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 代码示例的第一部分必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。The first part of the code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 第二个部分必须在.cs 文件 （对于 C# 中) 或 （对于 Visual Basic) 的.vb 文件中。The second part must be in a .cs file (for C#) or a .vb file (for Visual Basic). Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomImageButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_imagebutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomImageButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_imagebutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomImageButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_imagebutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomImageButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_imagebutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示将页回发到自身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你执行跨页面 post 使用控件。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. 设置属性时要发送到 Web 页的 url控件被单击。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定`Page2.aspx`导致包含的页控件来发送到`Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果未指定的值属性，在页发回发到自身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在执行与服务器端验证的控件与跨页回发时，你应检查页的属性是`true`之前处理回发。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 对于跨页回发，页面以检查是 PreviousPage。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage. 下面的 Visual Basic 代码演示如何做到这一点：The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 有关跨页发送技术的详细信息，请参阅[跨页发布 ASP.NET Web 窗体中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来执行跨页 post。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 当用户单击控件，在页发到指定的目标页的文本框中输入的值属性。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要运行此示例，你还必须在此代码示例所在的目录中创建目标页的文件。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 目标页的代码是下一步的示例中提供的。The code for the target page is provided in the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/imagebutton.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/imagebutton.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问从另一个页使用的一个值，已发布属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此页获取已发布从前一页，并将其显示给用户的字符串。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果你尝试直接运行此代码示例，则将会出错，因为值`Text`字段将为`null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `Text` field will be `null`. 相反，使用此代码创建一个目标页面并将该文件放在与上一示例的代码相同的目录。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 文件的名称必须对应于指定的值上一示例中的属性。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 当你运行上一示例的代码时，此页将在发生跨页发送时自动执行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross-page post occurs. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/imagebutton.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/imagebutton.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String)
protected: virtual void RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument);

span.span: The argument for the event.

summary.span: 当 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用的成员控件。The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 内部使用此方法控件，它被单击时，引发事件并根据定义，事件。This method is used internally by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event and, if defined, a event.

summary.span: 通知 ASP.NET 应用程序 控件的状态已更改。

span.span: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用的成员控件。The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 可以引发更改事件派生的类中重写此方法控制当回发到服务器。This method can be overridden in a derived class to raise change events for the control when it posts back to the server.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取与 控件相对应的 值。

span.span: Gets the value that corresponds to the control.
An enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义类时，使用属性主要由控件开发人员控件。The property is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 使用属性来确定与关联的值控件。Use the property to determine the value associated with an control. 此属性重写基实现来始终返回`HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`。This property overrides the base implementation to always return `HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写在自定义的方法控制，以便它始终返回一个输入标记。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom control so that it always returns an Input tag. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 代码示例的第一部分必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。The first part of the code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 第二个部分必须在.cs 文件 （对于 C# 中) 或 （对于 Visual Basic) 的.vb 文件中。The second part must be in a .cs file (for C#) or a .vb file (for Visual Basic). Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomImageButtonTagKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonTagKey/CS/custom_imagebutton_tagkeycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomImageButtonTagKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonTagKey/VB/custom_imagebutton_tagkeyvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomImageButtonTagKey#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonTagKey/CS/custom_imagebutton_tagkey.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomImageButtonTagKey#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonTagKey/VB/custom_imagebutton_tagkey.vb#2)]

The value of the control's property.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 当指定的值属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值与属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要验证时的控件控件回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 页面包含用于捕获从用户的数据的三个文本框和三个控件以确保用户未将一个文本框留空。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制中的前两个文本框中为`PersonalInfoGroup`验证组和控件中的第三个文本框是`LocationInfoGroup`验证组。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 当`ImageButton1`单击后，仅验证组中的控件`PersonalInfoGroup`进行验证。When `ImageButton1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 当`ImageButton2`单击后，仅验证分组中的控件`LocationInfoGroup`进行验证。When `ImageButton2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.ValidationGroup/CS/imagebutton.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.ValidationGroup/VB/imagebutton.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
